verses.text: \w Now|strong="H2088"\w* \w Elisha|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w summoned|strong="H7121"\w* \w one|strong="H2088"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w said|strong="H7121"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w him|strong="H7121"\w*, “Tuck \w your|strong="H3947"\w* cloak \w under|strong="H3027"\w* \w your|strong="H3947"\w* belt, \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w flask|strong="H6378"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w Ramoth-gilead|strong="H7433"\w*.

\w When|strong="H7200"\w* \w you|strong="H8432"\w* arrive, \w look|strong="H7200"\w* \w for|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jehu|strong="H3058"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w*, \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Nimshi|strong="H5250"\w*. \w Go|strong="H6965"\w* \w in|strong="H8432"\w*, \w get|strong="H6965"\w* \w him|strong="H7200"\w* away \w from|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H7200"\w* companions, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w take|strong="H1121"\w* \w him|strong="H7200"\w* \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w an|strong="H7200"\w* \w inner|strong="H2315"\w* \w room|strong="H2315"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H3947"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w flask|strong="H6378"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*, \w pour|strong="H3332"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* declare, ‘\w This|strong="H3541"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: \w I|strong="H3541"\w* \w anoint|strong="H4886"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.’ \w Then|strong="H3947"\w* \w open|strong="H6605"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w door|strong="H1817"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w run|strong="H5127"\w*. \w Do|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* delay!”
So \w the|strong="H3212"\w* \w young|strong="H5288"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w Ramoth-gilead|strong="H7433"\w*,

\w and|strong="H1697"\w* \w when|strong="H3427"\w* \w he|strong="H3605"\w* arrived, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w army|strong="H2428"\w* \w commanders|strong="H8269"\w* \w were|strong="H1697"\w* \w sitting|strong="H3427"\w* \w there|strong="H2009"\w*. “\w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w have|strong="H1697"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w message|strong="H1697"\w* \w for|strong="H3427"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w*, \w commander|strong="H8269"\w*,” \w he|strong="H3605"\w* \w said|strong="H1697"\w*. “\w For|strong="H3427"\w* \w which|strong="H4310"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* us?” \w asked|strong="H1697"\w* \w Jehu|strong="H3058"\w*. “\w For|strong="H3427"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w*, \w commander|strong="H8269"\w*,” \w he|strong="H3605"\w* replied.

\w So|strong="H3541"\w* Jehu \w got|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w went|strong="H3478"\w* \w into|strong="H3332"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w where|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* young prophet \w poured|strong="H3332"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* declared, “\w This|strong="H3541"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: ‘\w I|strong="H3541"\w* \w anoint|strong="H4886"\w* \w you|strong="H4886"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w over|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*’s \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H3027"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w strike|strong="H5221"\w* \w down|strong="H5221"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* master Ahab, \w so|strong="H3027"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w I|strong="H5650"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w avenge|strong="H5358"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w My|strong="H3605"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w shed|strong="H1818"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Jezebel.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Ahab \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w perish|strong="H3772"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w I|strong="H3772"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w cut|strong="H3772"\w* \w off|strong="H3772"\w* \w from|strong="H3772"\w* Ahab \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w male|strong="H8366"\w*, \w both|strong="H3605"\w* slave \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w free|strong="H5800"\w*, \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H1121"\w* \w make|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Ahab \w like|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Nebat|strong="H5028"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Baasha|strong="H1201"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Ahijah.

\w And|strong="H1817"\w* \w on|strong="H5127"\w* \w the|strong="H6605"\w* plot \w of|strong="H2506"\w* ground \w at|strong="H6912"\w* \w Jezreel|strong="H3157"\w* \w the|strong="H6605"\w* \w dogs|strong="H3611"\w* \w will|strong="H3611"\w* devour Jezebel, \w and|strong="H1817"\w* there \w will|strong="H3611"\w* be \w no|strong="H2506"\w* one \w to|strong="H5127"\w* \w bury|strong="H6912"\w* \w her|strong="H6605"\w*.’” \w Then|strong="H2506"\w* \w the|strong="H6605"\w* young prophet \w opened|strong="H6605"\w* \w the|strong="H6605"\w* \w door|strong="H1817"\w* \w and|strong="H1817"\w* \w ran|strong="H5127"\w*.

\w When|strong="H3318"\w* \w Jehu|strong="H3058"\w* \w went|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w of|strong="H5650"\w* \w his|strong="H3045"\w* master, \w they|strong="H3045"\w* asked, “\w Is|strong="H2088"\w* everything \w all|strong="H3045"\w* \w right|strong="H3045"\w*? \w Why|strong="H4069"\w* \w did|strong="H5650"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w madman|strong="H7696"\w* \w come|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w you|strong="H3045"\w*?” “\w You|strong="H3045"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w his|strong="H3045"\w* kind \w and|strong="H5650"\w* \w their|strong="H3045"\w* babble,” \w he|strong="H3318"\w* replied.

“\w That|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w lie|strong="H8267"\w*!” \w they|strong="H3068"\w* said. “\w Tell|strong="H5046"\w* \w us|strong="H4994"\w* \w now|strong="H4994"\w*!” \w So|strong="H3541"\w* Jehu \w answered|strong="H5046"\w*, “\w He|strong="H3068"\w* talked \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w me|strong="H4994"\w* \w about|strong="H4428"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w*, saying, ‘\w This|strong="H2063"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: \w I|strong="H3541"\w* \w anoint|strong="H4886"\w* \w you|strong="H5046"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w over|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.’”

\w Quickly|strong="H4116"\w*, \w each|strong="H3947"\w* man \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w his|strong="H7760"\w* garment \w and|strong="H4116"\w* \w put|strong="H7760"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \w under|strong="H8478"\w* \w Jehu|strong="H3058"\w* \w on|strong="H7760"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w bare|strong="H1634"\w* \w steps|strong="H4609"\w*. \w Then|strong="H3947"\w* \w they|strong="H3947"\w* \w blew|strong="H8628"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* ram’s \w horn|strong="H7782"\w* \w and|strong="H4116"\w* proclaimed, “\w Jehu|strong="H3058"\w* \w is|strong="H3058"\w* \w king|strong="H4427"\w*!”

\w Thus|strong="H1961"\w* \w Jehu|strong="H3058"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Nimshi|strong="H5250"\w*, \w conspired|strong="H7194"\w* \w against|strong="H6440"\w* \w Joram|strong="H3141"\w*. (\w Now|strong="H1961"\w* \w Joram|strong="H3141"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w been|strong="H1961"\w* \w defending|strong="H8104"\w* \w Ramoth-gilead|strong="H7433"\w* \w against|strong="H6440"\w* \w Hazael|strong="H2371"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Aram,

\w but|strong="H5221"\w* \w King|strong="H4428"\w* \w Joram|strong="H3088"\w* \w had|strong="H4428"\w* \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w Jezreel|strong="H3157"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w recover|strong="H7725"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w wounds|strong="H4347"\w* \w he|strong="H4480"\w* \w had|strong="H4428"\w* suffered \w at|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* hands \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* Arameans \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w battle|strong="H3898"\w* \w against|strong="H3898"\w* \w Hazael|strong="H2371"\w* \w their|strong="H7725"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.) \w So|strong="H4480"\w* \w Jehu|strong="H3058"\w* \w said|strong="H3318"\w*, “\w If|strong="H3426"\w* \w you|strong="H7725"\w* commanders \w wish|strong="H5315"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w make|strong="H5046"\w* \w me|strong="H5315"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w then|strong="H3318"\w* \w do|strong="H3318"\w* \w not|strong="H3318"\w* \w let|strong="H5046"\w* \w anyone|strong="H5315"\w* \w escape|strong="H6412"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* \w it|strong="H7725"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w Jezreel|strong="H3157"\w*.”

\w Then|strong="H4428"\w* \w Jehu|strong="H3058"\w* got \w into|strong="H3381"\w* \w his|strong="H7200"\w* \w chariot|strong="H7392"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w Jezreel|strong="H3157"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w Joram|strong="H3141"\w* \w was|strong="H4428"\w* \w laid|strong="H7901"\w* \w up|strong="H7200"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w*. \w And|strong="H3063"\w* Ahaziah \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w had|strong="H4428"\w* \w gone|strong="H3212"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w him|strong="H7200"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w watchman|strong="H6822"\w* \w standing|strong="H5975"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w tower|strong="H4026"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w Jezreel|strong="H3157"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w Jehu|strong="H3058"\w*’s \w troops|strong="H8229"\w* approaching, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w he|strong="H5921"\w* called \w out|strong="H7971"\w*, “\w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w company|strong="H8229"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w troops|strong="H8229"\w*!” “\w Choose|strong="H3947"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* rider,” \w Joram|strong="H3088"\w* commanded. “\w Send|strong="H7971"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w out|strong="H7971"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w meet|strong="H7125"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H7971"\w* ask, ‘\w Have|strong="H7200"\w* \w you|strong="H7971"\w* \w come|strong="H7125"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*?’”

\w So|strong="H3541"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w horseman|strong="H7392"\w* \w rode|strong="H7392"\w* \w off|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w meet|strong="H7125"\w* \w Jehu|strong="H3058"\w* \w and|strong="H7725"\w* said, “\w This|strong="H3541"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* asks: ‘\w Have|strong="H7965"\w* \w you|strong="H5704"\w* \w come|strong="H3212"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*?’” “\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w do|strong="H4100"\w* \w you|strong="H5704"\w* \w know|strong="H5046"\w* \w about|strong="H5437"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*?” \w Jehu|strong="H3058"\w* replied. “Fall \w in|strong="H4428"\w* behind \w me|strong="H7725"\w*.” \w And|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w watchman|strong="H6822"\w* \w reported|strong="H5046"\w*, “\w The|strong="H3541"\w* \w messenger|strong="H4397"\w* \w reached|strong="H5704"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w he|strong="H5704"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w coming|strong="H7125"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w out|strong="H7971"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w second|strong="H8145"\w* \w horseman|strong="H7392"\w*, \w who|strong="H4428"\w* \w went|strong="H4428"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w them|strong="H7971"\w* \w and|strong="H7971"\w* said, “\w This|strong="H3541"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* asks: ‘\w Have|strong="H7965"\w* \w you|strong="H7971"\w* \w come|strong="H5437"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*?’” “\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w do|strong="H4100"\w* \w you|strong="H7971"\w* know \w about|strong="H5437"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*?” \w Jehu|strong="H3058"\w* replied. “Fall \w in|strong="H4428"\w* behind \w me|strong="H7971"\w*.”

\w Again|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w watchman|strong="H6822"\w* \w reported|strong="H5046"\w*, “\w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w reached|strong="H5704"\w* \w them|strong="H7725"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H1121"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* coming \w back|strong="H7725"\w*. \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* charioteer \w is|strong="H1121"\w* \w driving|strong="H4491"\w* \w like|strong="H3808"\w* \w Jehu|strong="H3058"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Nimshi|strong="H5250"\w*—\w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H1121"\w* \w driving|strong="H4491"\w* \w like|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* madman!”

“Harness!” \w Joram|strong="H3088"\w* shouted, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w they|strong="H3478"\w* harnessed \w his|strong="H3478"\w* \w chariot|strong="H7393"\w*. \w Then|strong="H3318"\w* \w Joram|strong="H3088"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* Ahaziah \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w set|strong="H3478"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w*, each \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w his|strong="H3478"\w* own \w chariot|strong="H7393"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w met|strong="H4672"\w* \w Jehu|strong="H3058"\w* \w on|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* \w property|strong="H2513"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Naboth|strong="H5022"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* \w Jezreelite|strong="H3158"\w*.

\w When|strong="H1961"\w* \w Joram|strong="H3088"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w Jehu|strong="H3058"\w*, \w he|strong="H5704"\w* \w asked|strong="H4100"\w*, “\w Have|strong="H1961"\w* \w you|strong="H5704"\w* \w come|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H7227"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*, \w Jehu|strong="H3058"\w*?” “\w How|strong="H4100"\w* \w can|strong="H4100"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*,” \w he|strong="H5704"\w* replied, “\w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w long|strong="H5704"\w* \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* idolatry \w and|strong="H7200"\w* witchcraft \w of|strong="H7227"\w* \w your|strong="H7200"\w* mother Jezebel \w abound|strong="H7227"\w*?”

\w Joram|strong="H3088"\w* \w turned|strong="H2015"\w* \w around|strong="H3027"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w fled|strong="H5127"\w*, calling \w out|strong="H5127"\w* \w to|strong="H3027"\w* Ahaziah, “\w Treachery|strong="H4820"\w*, Ahaziah!”
